definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Seahorses like to live in shallow waters amongst the seaweed and eelgrass.
sentences.chinese: 海马喜欢住在海藻或鳗草丛中的浅海。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of marine algal polysaccharide on immune function of irradiated mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察海藻多糖对辐射损伤小鼠免疫功能的影响。

sentences.english: As a result, seaweed food with strange anti-obesity .
sentences.chinese: 因此，海藻类食物具有奇特的减肥功效。

sentences.english: He fed the plant a mixture containing fish and  seaweed.
sentences.chinese: 他用一种含有鱼类和海藻的混合物给植物施肥。

sentences.english: Sea weed extract is neither a rare nor expensive ingredient.
sentences.chinese: 海藻萃取液是一种既非稀有也不昂贵的成分。

sentences.english: Fixed dead seaweed popping on, now stipples on.
sentences.chinese: 固定死的海藻出现，现在点画上。

sentences.english: In the world of the kelp forest, nothing goes to waste.
sentences.chinese: 在海藻的森林世界，任何东西都不会被浪费。

sentences.english: Algin was refined from marine alga.
The soluble dietary fiber is the konjac flour or sodium alginate powder.
sentences.chinese: 可溶性膳食纤维为魔芋精粉或海藻酸钠粉。

sentences.english: Damselfish use the resulting gardens of algae for feeding and producing young.
sentences.chinese: 少女鱼利用肥沃的海藻来喂养和生产幼仔。

sentences.english: The experimental results showed that Na-alginate is a better kind of matrix.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，海藻酸钠是较好的固定化载体。

sentences.english: The application of calcium alginate immobilized method in brewing yeast cell.
sentences.chinese: 研究了海藻酸钙固定化技术在酿酒酵母上的应用。

sentences.english: FT-IR indicated that acrylic acid was grafted on alga.
sentences.chinese: IR初步表明了丙烯酸与海藻的接枝聚合作用。

sentences.english: Now the beach is deserted except for some kelp.
sentences.chinese: 以前的沙滩已被遗忘，如今记忆里只漂着几片海藻。

sentences.english: A new technology was studied on extraction of trehalose from yeast by microwave cell disruption.
sentences.chinese: 尝试了微波强化活性干酵母中提取海藻糖的新工艺。

sentences.english: Tiny floats along each stem are enough to hold it up.
sentences.chinese: 每节海藻茎周围的微小浮力就足以使它傲然挺立。

definition: shell/conch/cowry/mother of pearl/hard outer skin/also pr. [bei4 qiao4]
flavored roasted seaweed/generic term for edible seaweed/Japanese: nori
shallow sea/sea less than 200 meters deep
